content:
Issue 1: Minimum requirements for enabling technology

  • What do we need from the enabling technology? What do we miss?

    • Point-to-point vs. multicast mechanisms?
    • Asynchronous vs. synchronous mechanisms?
    • Reliable delivery?
    • Secure communication?
    • ...

  • What can we or do we need to implement as part of the ISEN?
